channel.title: Azure Front Door on Azure and DevOops
channel.description: Recent content in Azure Front Door on Azure and DevOops

item.title: Deliver your apps using Azure Front Door
item.description: Azure Front Door Frequently I speak to cloud admins and consultants who’ve heard about Azure Front Door, but are not sure about what it does or havent interacted with it. I have some experience deploying and managing Front Door instances of customers. Most heard comment is: “It’s a thing that does something with application delivery, right?”. In the near future I want pursue on the AZ-700 certification, so I thought a win-win in blogging about!
